import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { discountCalc } from "../api/List"; import CartContext from "../context/cartContext"; export const SizeModal = ({ product }) => { const cart = useContext(CartContext); const onSizeChange = (e) => { cart.setSize(e.target.value); }; return (
{product.name} {product.category.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + product.category.slice(1)}
₹{product.price} {product.oldPrice && ( <> ₹{product.oldPrice} ({discountCalc(product.oldPrice, product.price)}% OFF) )}

Select size

); };
